type: Tutorial Step - Let's Start With the Menu

definition.text: The left-hand side of a node's menu is common to most nodes. The right-hand side, however, is specific to the type of node!

paragraphs.text: Let's take a close look at the left-hand side!

The design space functions under the paradigm of a self-organizing workspace in which nodes tend to find their place guided by certain arrangement properties that you may control from the node's menu.
Click the pin button on the top-left corner of the Session Base Asset node. Now drag the node away and release it! Now drag and release any other node without pinning it. See the difference?
